sources.title: Age of Kill | Full Movie | Action Sniper | Martin Kemp | Donna Air
sources.description:
Age of Kill - A black ops sniper is blackmailed by a psychotic international terrorist into killing 6 unrelated people in 6 hours... but there is more to the victims than meets the eye.
2015. Stars: Martin Kemp, Dani Dyer, Donna Air
